name: ToaZZle (itch)
description:
In the game ToaZZle You have to go through 40 interesting levels of puzzle,

which would leave only the red frog on a water lilies.
Jump from water lilies to water lilies as fast and deftly as you can,
trying not to get into the pond, but pushing others there!

Sounds simple, doesn't it? It's easy to check.
Start ToaZZle right now and start passing levels
as fast as possible to get 3 stars and achievements!
Show everyone who is the king of the pond!

Peculiar properties:
- Beautiful graphics
- Challenging and interesting levels
- Pleasant soundtrack
- Achievements
